statements: DELETE FROM policyholders WHERE name = 'John Doe'
DELETE FROM policyholders WHERE policyholder_id = 101 AND name = 'John Doe';
DELETE FROM policyholders WHERE contact_details LIKE '%@gmail.com';
DELETE FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Car' AND policyholder_id = 3;
DELETE FROM Policies WHERE policy_type = 'Health' AND start_date < '2022-01-01';
DELETE FROM policy_claim WHERE policy_id = 1 AND claim_amount > 5000;
DELETE FROM claims WHERE policy_id IN (SELECT policy_id FROM policies WHERE policy_type = 'Life Insurance');
